entry.title: WIND WARNING, Claresholm

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low 12.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming north 20 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
